page.title: 07Shopping in Pendlebury
page.content: Yates's Newsagents is on{Bolton {Road}in{Newtown, Pendlebury.}Our group went there and found that they sell 1770{morning papers}each week, about 300 are sold in{Clifton.}60 percent of all the papers are delivered. Sunday is their best day, they sell 675 {Sunday papers. They get their papers from the wholesalers. The most popular papers are{The Daily Mirror, The Sunday {Mirror and the News Of The World.}They employ seven paper boys in the morning, eight at night and eight on Sundays. They cover the area from the {Unity Brook}to{Pendlebury market}and from the bottom of{Queensway}to {Pendlebury High School.
